content: hi there i m cilla - the crochet addict over at cillacrochets 1 thank you so much for viewing my beaming banana crochet pattern on ravelry it means so much to me you can get this free crochet pattern over on my website here 2 or purchase the pdf crochet pattern right here on ravelry ** click here to view the pattern on my website 3 ** a couple of notes to mention about the pattern * i used rico design creative cotton aran in banana yellow white brown and light green * you ll also need scissors tapestry needle stuffing and a stitch marker * my four pattern testers gave me great feedback on the pattern and i believe it is suitable for crocheters at any skill level * this pattern is written in us terms in english only * please do not copy or reproduce this pattern however i am more than happy if you d like to sell your makes using the pattern just double check the copyright notice below for more information if you do decide to crochet this banana i would absolutely love to see your makes you can share them with me on ravelry instagram 4 or facebook 5 @cillacrochets and by using the hashtag #crochetbeamingbanana thanks so much and i hope you have fun cilla x copyright © 2020 cilla crochets cilla richards all rights reserved this pattern is a design of cilla richards cillacrochets it is illegal to sell distribute and/or translate into a different language this pattern or any part of it under a different designer s name you cannot sell or share freely this pattern and/or any translated version of this pattern in print or digitally you can make and sell products made using this pattern with credit to the designer however i accept no liability whatsoever for the safety durability and performance of the products you make you may want to check the ce testing requirements if you are planning to sell these as toys in some countries 1 https //www cillacrochets com/ 2 https //www cillacrochets com/beaming-banana 3 https //www cillacrochets com/beaming-banana
